channel.title: Torify all traffic from specified eth device
channel.description: I host Whonix on Linux Debian 10 with Oracle VM VirtualBox installed. I attached additional ethernet card, configured it in Workstation's VM settings as bridged network card and set up an IP 192.168.0.1/24 on it. There's other PC with IP 192.168.0.2 connected to this network card with gateway set up to 192.168.0.1. Is that possible to torify all network traffic from this PC trought TOR? I added iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -o eth0 -j MASQUERADE but it still does not work.
